name: Dance Challenge
description: Perform a dance of your choice for at least 30 seconds
rules_for_referee: Referee to judge based on effort and duration. Player must dance for 30 seconds or more.

name: Comedy Challenge
description: Tell a joke that makes at least one other player laugh
rules_for_referee: Referee to judge based on whether the joke elicited genuine laughter from other players.

name: Cartwheel Challenge
description: Perform a cartwheel or attempt one safely
rules_for_referee: Referee to judge based on effort and safety. Partial attempts count if done safely.

name: Magic Challenge
description: Perform a magic trick or illusion for the group
rules_for_referee: Referee to judge based on creativity and presentation. Simple tricks are acceptable.

sideA: FLIP ONE OF YOUR OWN CARDS
name: Quick Flip
description: Flip one of your own cards to its opposite side
rules_for_referee: Player chooses which of their own cards to flip.

sideA: FLIP ONE OF YOUR OWN CARDS
name: Strategic Flip
description: Flip one of your own cards to change your strategy
rules_for_referee: Player chooses which of their own cards to flip.

sideA: FLIP ONE OF YOUR OWN CARDS
name: Emergency Flip
description: Flip one of your own cards
rules_for_referee: Player chooses which of their own cards to flip.

name: Mimic Card
description: Copy the effect of another player's active rule or modifier card
rules_for_referee: Select a target player and one of their active rule/modifier cards to mimic.

name: Copycat Card
description: Duplicate the power of another player's active rule or modifier card
rules_for_referee: Select a target player and one of their active rule/modifier cards to duplicate.

name: Mirror Card
description: Reflect the effect of another player's active rule or modifier card
rules_for_referee: Select a target player and one of their active rule/modifier cards to mirror.

name: Trade Cards
description: Exchange one of your cards with another player's card
rules_for_referee: Select a player and cards to trade.

name: Card Exchange
description: Swap one of your cards with another player's card
rules_for_referee: Select a player and cards to exchange.

name: Card Switch
description: Switch one of your cards with another player's card
rules_for_referee: Select a player and cards to switch.
